snippet: The anticipated arrival of Tropical Storm Arthur in the New York City area is making it difficult for residents to plan outdoor activities for the Fourth of July weekend.
abstract: Tropical Storm Arthur may dampen Fourth of July fireworks and other outdoor activities, but residents of New York metropolitan area still plan to celebrate holiday.
lead_paragraph: The anticipated arrival of Tropical Storm Arthur in the New York City area is making it difficult for residents to plan outdoor activities for the Fourth of July weekend.

headline.main: Rain May Spare Fireworks, but Not Other July 4th Plans
headline.print_headline: Rain May Spare Fireworks, but Not Other July 4th Plans
